components.title: University of Texas at Austin
components.description: Currently studying Aerospace Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin. Also getting a certificate in Elements of Computing. Member of Texas' premiere startup club, Texas Momentum, as well as the Longhorn Startup Lab. Involved in the Scholars of Finance club and Kappa Sigma Tau fraternity.

components.title: Dassault Systémes
components.description: Interned at Medidata Solutions, a Dassault Systémes company, in New York over the summer and into my senior fall semester. Built reusable terraform modules, service agnostic GitHub actions workflows, and migrated services from deprecated IaC and CI/CD platforms.

components.title: Gazelle Ecosolutions
components.description: VP Engineering -> Chief Technology Officer at Gazelle Ecosolutions. Built out Gazelle's premiere mobile application, and leading development of the Gazelle Hub. Leading a team of 7 Software Engineers and 6 designers. Gazelle catalyzes grassland conservation by making project development incredibly simple and quick. Raised over $1M in 2023. Backed by Shell.

components.title: Pedi STAT
components.description: Was the sole software engineer in rebuilding the entire Pedi STAT mobile application. Implemented a shell application allowing medication details to be loaded in building infrastructure for multiple hospitals and medical institutions to build their own custom applications. Created client dashboard for manually adding and editing medication and algorithms. Ranked Top 5 on both App Store and Google Play Store. Over 200,000 downloads.

components.title: VISA
components.description: Worked as a Software Engineer intern for VISA in the summer of 2023. Worked on the FXTI team to build an internal tool to track and manage foreign trades.

components.title: Drone Estimation Lab (Research)
components.description: Design, manufacture, and program a drone to estimate position in GPS-denied environments using an Extended Kalman Filter. Professor: Adam Nokes
